meanings.definition: Covered in or consisting of soft, muddy, or decaying matter.
meanings.sent1: The sloughy ground made it difficult to walk through the marsh.
meanings.sent2: After the heavy rain, the path became sloughy and messy.
meanings.sent3: The sloughy mud seemed to cling to my shoes like a stubborn friend.
meanings.sent4: The sloughy terrain resembled a battlefield after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The sloughy texture of the soil reminded me of a forgotten garden.

meanings.sent1: The sloughy sloth moved slowly through the trees.
meanings.sent2: Feeling sloughy after a long day, she decided to rest on the couch.
meanings.sent3: The sloughy cat lazily stretched out in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: His sloughy pace in the race cost him the victory.
meanings.sent5: The sloughy atmosphere of the room made everyone yawn.
